content-security-policy.name: content-security-policy
content-security-policy.score_description: Content Security Policy (CSP) implemented unsafely. This includes 'unsafe-inline' or data: inside script-src, overly broad sources such as https: inside object-src or script-src, or not restricting the sources for object-src or script-src.

contribute.name: contribute
contribute.score_description: Contribute.json isn't required on websites that don't belong to Mozilla

cookies.name: cookies
cookies.score_description: All cookies use the Secure flag, session cookies use the HttpOnly flag, and cross-origin restrictions are in place via the SameSite flag

cross-origin-resource-sharing.name: cross-origin-resource-sharing
cross-origin-resource-sharing.score_description: Content is not visible via cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) files or headers

public-key-pinning.name: public-key-pinning
public-key-pinning.score_description: HTTP Public Key Pinning (HPKP) header not implemented

redirection.name: redirection
redirection.score_description: Initial redirection is to HTTPS on same host, final destination is HTTPS

strict-transport-security.name: strict-transport-security
strict-transport-security.score_description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) header set to a minimum of six months (15768000)

subresource-integrity.name: subresource-integrity
subresource-integrity.score_description: Subresource Integrity (SRI) not implemented, but all scripts are loaded from a similar origin

x-frame-options.name: x-frame-options
x-frame-options.score_description: X-Frame-Options (XFO) header set to SAMEORIGIN or DENY
